summary: A Japanese photojournalist revisits Vietnam after the Liberation and learns harsh truths about its regime and its "New Economic Zones".
cast: Jianzhou Cai|Tung-Sheng Chang|Gamhung Cheung|Shui-Chiu Gan|Hengbao Guo|Junyi Guo|Jialing Hao|Meiying Jia|George Lam|Andy Lau|Shujing Lin|Tao Lin|Season Ma|Pingmei Meng|Cora Miao|Mengshi Qi|Huangwen Wang|Shouquan Wang|Shujun Wu
title: Tau ban no hoi
